## Hyunjoo Kim for Peer Assessment <2018-05-13>

```{r,comment='',echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
SeoulKorea <- data.frame(name = c("Jongro", "Gangnam"),
lat = c(37.576193, 37.499184),
lng = c(126.976795, 127.027621))

SeoulSites<-c(
  "<a href='http://www.jongno.go.kr/portalMain.do'>Jongrogu</a>",
  "<a href='http://www.gangnam.go.kr/main.do'>Gangnamgu</a>"
)

SeoulKorea %>%
leaflet() %>%
addTiles() %>%
addMarkers(popup = SeoulSites)
```
